name: UberCafe
description:
Description

You must drift and swerve coffee to sleepy customers! Forget traffic laws, people need their coffee and only you can deliver! 

Keyboard Controls

W: Accelerate

A: Steer left

S: Reverse

D: Steer right

PS1 Controller Bindings

Left stick: Steer

X: Accelerate

Circle: Reverse

Team members

Leo Herrera

Eddie Mustafaa

Zach Kolman

Assets used

BGM: N.Y. Rush - The Seatbelts

Sound effects: freesound.org

Art assets: Kenney
